reasoning: Clear cell adenocarcinoma incidence estimated at ~9.5 per 100k, primarily representing clear cell renal cell carcinoma (ccRCC) which accounts for ~70-80% of RCC cases (global RCC incidence ~10-15 per 100k). Histological subtype with incidence varying by primary organ site.
source: Ljungberg B et al. (2015). EAU guidelines on renal cell carcinoma: 2014 update. Eur Urol. 67(5):913-924
